title.en: Supplication to the Great Khenpo Gangshar Wangpo

text.en: With your studies complete, your knowledge is as vast as the sky;
text.en-trans: jangwa tarchin khepé pul du chin

text.en: With experience and understanding mastered, you realised inner reality;
text.en-trans: nyamtok tarchin nang gi denyi tok

text.en: And, with altruism perfected, any connection with you becomes truly meaningful.
text.en-trans: zhenpen tarchin drel tsen dön dangden

text.en: Changchub Dorje, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: changchub dorjé zhab la solwa deb
